name: Zissi's Island
description: Zissi's Island is an open-world 3D platformer set on a tropical island with emphasis on exploration.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP + Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 7600 / AMD Radeon HD 2400 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 + Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 / AMD Radeon HD 5970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
